description: image of print broken up into three separate sections; left section is a gradated mossy green with thin black lines and thin black grid system; top right image is a lighter green with organic shadowy elements of curling sticks, a leaf, and transparent watery drips; bottom right section is purple with a leaves and petals, with a darker blue squared off area in ULC, and orange rectangular section on left
inscription: LRC, in pencil: c 550 | on back, in bottom center, in pencil: Shinko Araki | Green Flora- V
medium: Etching and aquatint; ink and color on paper
title: Green Flora V
